definitions.definition: The characteristic of using a minimum of something (especially money ).
examples: His thrift can be seen in how little the trashman takes from his house.
Usually, home mortgages are obtained from thrifts .

definitions.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Armeria , particularly Armeria maritima .
Success and advance in the acquisition of property ; increase of worldly goods; gain ; prosperity ; profit .
Vigorous growth , as of a plant .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The characteristic of using a minimum of something (especially money ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Any of various plants of the genus Armeria , particularly Armeria maritima .
( obsolete ) Success and advance in the acquisition of property ; increase of worldly goods; gain ; prosperity ; profit .
( obsolete ) Vigorous growth , as of a plant .
